channel.title: Hugo on 云溪部落
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on 云溪部落

item.title: Using Cloudflare Free SSL In GitHub Pages With Custom Domain
item.description:
I have succeed in migrating my blog from Hexo to Hugo platform, new domain is AxdLog. As Github Pages doesn’t provide SSL certificate for custom domain, so I need to deploy it separately. CloudFlare provides free SSL certificate, and it has the ability of anti-ddos.

This article documents how to configure CloudFlare free SSL certificate in Github Pages.

item.title: Using Hugo and Travis CI To Deploy Blog To Github Pages Automatically
item.description:
My personal static blog is hosted on Github. I used Hexo before, but as its complicated package dependence and cumbersome deployment process, I have to encapsulated the whole deploying environment into Docker image for rapid deployment. But it was still too complex. Now I switch to Hugo which is faster, simpler.

This article documents how to automatically synchronize blog contents generated by Hugo to Github through Travis CI.

Attention: The following operation process will not involve account registration, Git configuration.
